data.text: @AnirudhKejriwal Mr Kejriwal, please DM us your registered email ID & contact number so we can raise this issue with the concerned team. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@acebhargav Hi, sorry to know about your baggage. Please DM us your PNR to help us assist in reuniting you with your baggage. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Maine_kahaa Hi, this is certainly not good to hear. Please DM us in detail what went wrong along with your PNR. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Rajpura4 Hi, this doesn't seem right. Please DM us your experience in detail along with the PNR for us to take a closer look. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Prashan45482839 Sir, we regret the trouble and never wanted to our passengers to have such an experience. Could you please DM the PNR so we may check? ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Pramod_k_s Mr Sharma, our fares are dynamic in nature and may increase or decrease subject to seat availability. We look forward to your understanding. ~Linda
@buzzindelhi Mr Gupta, your love and support is the wind beneath our wings that takes us to places 😊. Thank you for sharing such a beautiful shot. We hope you'll join us onboard soon. ~Team IndiGo
@CollinSChambers We are so glad to know that our staff could reunite you with your baggage, Ms Chambers. Wish to see you onboard soon, again! ~Sheetal
@Manikandan2k4 Sir, we never wanted you to have such an experience. Let us know your PNRs via DM we'll get it checked. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@bharatshah91 Mr Shah, separate excess baggage charges will be applicable for the additional piece of check-in baggage. ~Linda
@poojann Yes, you may club your check-in baggage in case travelling under the same PNR & weight limit should not exceed 32 kgs. Thanks! ~Shreya

entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to travel as airlines, travel agencies, hotels

entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text:
@chellam_sir_op Sir, we try our best to keep the aircraft insect-free by regularly spraying disinfectants. We are sure that you will understand that entry of insects or flies cannot be completely guarded against. Did you reach out to our cabin crew? ~Linda
  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@niiight0wl Hi, please DM us your concern in detail along with the PNR. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@RahulPr16075283 Mr Prashar, please know that this is the best we can offer. We request you to confirm your acceptance so, we may proceed further. ~Nandita

@gauravj02341372 baggage sorting area, baggage belt, baggage trolley & aircraft baggage hold. We will share your feedback with the baggage handling team to be more careful. We hope to give you a better experience the next time you choose to fly with us. ~Linda (2/2)

@gauravj02341372 Mr Jain, we always to try to deliver passengers' baggage in the same condition as we have received them at the time of check-in. However, such damage can occur during loading & offloading of the baggage at several points like (1/2)

@Navnath51465668 Hi, we regret the delay which is caused due to the late arrival of the incoming flight. Further, we see boarding for your flight is in progress. Please allow our team sometime while they're working hard to expedite the process. ~Linda

@i_harishbhaktha Mr Bhakta, the revised departure is at 18:25 hrs due to the late arrival of the incoming flight. Further, we see boarding for your flight is in progress. Please allow our team sometime while they're working hard to expedite the process. ~Linda
@P27666 Hi, please DM us your PNR along with all the details so we can check & assist you further. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@anurag_ifs Mr Arya, this doesn't sound right. We'd request you to DM us your experience a bit more in detail so we can raise this with the concerned team at the earliest. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@DeepakGarg65 Mr Garg, this doesn't seem right. Please DM us your PNR along with the medical documents duly stamped & signed by the treating doctor so we can check further. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@HabibMoiz786 Further, any item left or forgotten on the airport premises is deposited at their lost & found counter. We request you reach out to them at 04066606064 for assistance. ~Snigdha 2/2

@HabibMoiz786 Sir, we understand your concern. As communicated by our customer relations team, we tried our best to search for the said item at every possible location and regret to inform you that we were unable to locate the same. 1/2

@sourabh_kanthed @PIB_India @PMOIndia @republic @aajtak @ABPNews @indiatvnews @ndtv @TheLallantop Sir, we would like to apprise you that the price of 6E Menu items has been revised effective from November 02, 2022 and the 6E Magazine pricing section has been updated too. Hope this clarifies. We look forward to your understanding of the same. ~Snigdha

data.text: @shooter_vinayak Mr Srivastava, we'd like to speak with you in this regard. Please DM us your PNR along with the contact number. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@lokeshlokr Hi, happy to know you've received your belonging. :) Even more happier to know our team could assist you well. We hope to see you soon again. #GoIndiGo ~Linda

@koolkalim Mr Shaikh, we see you have web checked-in through auto seat assignment, wherein the boarding pass is sent to the registered email ID within 12-3 hrs prior to the departure. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@azamweblink Mr Sikandar, please DM us your concern in detail along with the PNR so we can assist yo further. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@HolaniVishal Mr Holani, please DM us the description of the mobile phone like, brand, colour etc. so we can check further. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@nebulaekoo Sir, the refund is initiated from our end to the original mode of payment. Please connect with your travel agency for further assistance.~ Nandita
@myithri Hi, we're here to assist you. Please DM us your contact number so we can get in touch with you in this regard. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@vabhz Mr Ujjainiya, your feedback is of extreme importance to us which enables us to enhance & deliver better services to all our customers. We hope to serve you well in the future. ~Linda

@indreshrahul Mr Uniyal, you can carry the baby stroller in both, cabin and check-in baggage provided it is foldable. Please let us know via DM if we can assist you further to make your travel experience hassle-free with the little one. ~ Sheetal
  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@rshrivigneshwar Sir, that must be a glitch but, no worries, please DM us your PNR for us to assist you further. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Baudam_Bhartiya Mr Rao, we'd like to speak with you in this regard hence, please DM us the PNR along with the contact details. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@hashedDNA Hi, that's certainly not good to see. At times, the seat cushion gets adrift from its Velcro. The same can be re-positioned. Further, your feedback will be shared with the concerned team for review. Hope to serve you better in the future. ~Linda

@hmarwahahs Mr Singh, we understand how you must be feeling! However, please know that certain unavoidable circumstances lead to such cancellations. Further, please DM your PNR for us to take a closer look. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@rexdavid73 Sir, the prices on our 6E Menu have undergone changes recently. While, we understand this shouldn't have happened, we'll have your feedback shared with the concerned team right away for necessary review & staff briefing. We look forward to serving you better in the future. ~Linda

@rshrivigneshwar Sir, our free seats are limited which get occupied quickly. However, you can always opt for auto-seat assignment & complete the web check-in wherein the boarding pass will be sent to the registered email ID within 12-3 hrs prior to the departure. ~Linda
@prtik0406 Mr Bhatt, this is sad! Please DM your PNR for us to take a closer look & assist you further. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@k54706283 Sir, we believe one of our representatives addressed your concern via call and assisted you in the best possible way. ~Prahlad
@RajIndiahrm Mr Tarwar, this doesn't seem right! Please DM us a bit more in detail what went wrong along with the PNR to help us address this at the earliest. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@PoonamA69317624 Ms Agrawal, this is certainly not good to hear. Please DM us in detail what went wrong along with the PNR. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@nitesh_gg Please DM us your PNR so we can pass on your feedback to the team which will enable us to enhance & deliver better services to all our customers. ~Linda (2/2)  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@nitesh_gg Mr Goswami, we regret the experience. Comfort & well being of all our customers is of paramount importance to us especially, for the ones who require special care & attention. (1/2)

@jeettrivedi12 Mr Trivedi, being on time is what we strive for. However, given the nature of our operation certain unanticipated schedule changes become inevitable & is beyond our control. Further, please DM us your PNR so we may share your feedback. ~Linda
  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@vikramraghava Sir, our team tried calling you, however, couldn't establish a connection. Please share a convenient time to speak. ~Prahlad
@ymwadekar Thank you for the shout-out, Sir. We are glad to know our staff assisted you well. We'll definitely pass on the Kudos to her. Please help us with your PNR via DM. Thanks. ~Ojasvi
@vedyadav42 Sir, this is not the experience we intend to provide. Please help us with your PNR via DM so we can share your feedback with the concerned team for further review. ~Ojasvi
@vardhan589 Sir, we are concerned to hear this. Please DM us in detail so we can act on it at the earliest. ~Ojasvi

urls.title: Student Discount Flights - Upto 6% off and 10KG extra baggage | IndiGo
urls.description: IndiGo offer a great deal for students with special Student Discount, get upto 6% off on base fare and also get additional 10kg baggage allowance.

data.text: @shreyaslohar Sir, a valid school/university ID will be required to avail of this. You may visit https://t.co/5F2hbIcMyf for comprehensive information related to student booking. Thanks. ~Ojasvi
@NishuRa70946707 Hello, we believe that our airport team got connected and assisted you and your baggage has  been delivered to you. Thank You. ~Diyashi

@UrmiBhattacha10 Ma'am, as checked, the refund has been initiated to the primary source of payment on the 21st of October, 2022. We request you to get in touch with the concerned travel agency for the same. ~Ojasvi

@Humanity26Amit Thank you for speaking with us, Mr Mehra. Be assured, that your feedback is noted and will be shared with the team for review. Looking forward to serving you better in the future.~Vaishali

urls.title: Track Refund status for your booking online - IndiGo
urls.description: Check Refund Status - Now track your refund in easy steps online. Know your refund status for flight booking and track online at goIndiGo.in website.

data.text: @shaazmukherjee Mr Mukherjee, we understand your concern. As checked, a full refund has been initiated to the primary mode of payment. You can keep a track of the refund using https://t.co/y84mKXjY56. We request you to get in touch with the concerned travel agency for further assistance. ~Ojasvi
@Anurag2587 Sir, we never intend to provide such an experience. We have duly noted your feedback and will raise the same with the concerned team to avoid such instances in the future. ~Ojasvi
@shekharsarkar07 Mr Sarkar, please allow us some time to get it checked. We will update you.~Vaishali
@AshishShukla72 Sir, allow us some time to get it checked and get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi
@vijayant141187 Sir, we've replied to you via DM. You may check.~Vaishali
@docaseem We have noted your feedback and will share it with the team for review and staff briefing. Please share your PNR via DM. Thanks.~Vaishali  (2/2)

@docaseem Hi, as advised earlier, to ensure complete security, Ids are checked at the boarding gate also. Also, rude behavior is not at all accepted & our staff is expected to be courteous all the time. (1/2)

@kumarakshay1 Sir, we understand your cocnern. Your feedback is important to us. Be assured, the same will be shared with the team for necessary review. Looking forward to serving you better in the future.~Vaishali
@Anurag2587 Sir, this doesn't look right to us. We request you to share your PNR via DM so we can check and assist. ~Ojasvi
@DrEVIL0071 Hi, we've replied to you via DM. You may check.~Vaishali
@idkidcFO_ Mr Sharma, please share your concern along with the PNR via DM so we may check and assist you. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@tsrinivasraghu Sir, please be informed that our staff tries to accept every passenger till a certain time limit. When it's not possible to accept the passengers taking a-lot of factors in account, they deny the check-in/boarding. We request your understanding on the same.~Vaishali

urls.title: FAQs About Travel Certificate - IndiGo
urls.description: What is a Travel Certificate? Get help with travel certificate related queries from listed frequently asked questions. Learn more at goIndiGo.in website.

data.text: @arjunchris30 Sir, please be informed that, once the journey is completed, we cannot issue the boarding pass. However, we can provide you with a travel certificate. Please visit https://t.co/Zn3zKsHnQv to know about travel certificates. Thank you. ~Diyashi
@IndiGo6E Mr Vaz, could you please share the PNR along via DM along with the detailed issue so we may look into it? Thanks.~Vaishali
@garimas48380239 Ma'am, we can totally understand your concern. Also, your feedback is duly noted and will be shared with the team. Looking forward to serving you better in the future.~Vaishali
@RuchikaSChauhan Ms Chauhan, we believe your baggage has been united with you by now. Further, the inconvenience is regretted. Looking forward to serve you better in the future Thanks.~Vaishali

urls.title: Jobs at IndiGo
urls.description: It’s time to recruit smart. Param's recruiting software helps automate tedious, repetitive manual tasks like resume screening. It equips recruiters with the means to efficiently cater to increasingly complex recruiting deliverables.

data.text: @Chaithu44977477 We regret the delay in response. As we are receiving a high volume of mentions we could not cater to your query on time. Also, your feedback is duly notedHope to serve you better in the future.~Vaishali
@krishnachaubey8 Sir, we know it's taking longer than usual. Our team is working on it. Please bear with us in this interim.~Vaishali
@puneetdawer Let us know if further assistance is needed. Thanks.~Vaishali

urls.title: 6E QuickBoard: Skip queues, Board the flight early - IndiGo
urls.description: Skip queues and be the first to board the flight with our all-new 6E QuickBoard. Add 6E QuickBoard to your flight booking to enjoy early boarding add-on service.

data.text: @piyushsagrawal However, you may avail of the priority boarding on your next flight by clicking on https://t.co/1toZAnKNkM. Wishing you a pleasant flight. ~Diyashi (2/2)
@piyushsagrawal Mr Agarwal, we wish to inform you that Fast Forward Services provide fast-forward check-in and priority baggage delivery at the arrival station and not a priority in boarding.  (1/2)

urls.title: How to Check-in | Print Boarding Pass - IndiGo
urls.description: IndiGo offers you multiple check-in options. Save time by online check-in or using the IndiGo mobile app. You can also download & print boarding pass online.

data.text: @priyanjit9 Mr Mondal, we are here to assist and request you to visit https://t.co/ixkCPKQX6a to complete the Web Check-In. Please don't change the assigned seats and let us know in case you face any issues. ~Navi

@PariweshP Mr Piyush, we regret the experience. We always want to ensure the check-in baggage of passengers arrives in a safe condition. However, minor wear and tear may occur during the loading and offloading of the bag. Rest, we have noted your feedback in this regard. ~Navi

@nilamni125 Hi, we understand you and request you to DM us your PNR to check. Rest, you may get in touch with our Airport Team for any real-time assistance on the same. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@manglanivishalp Mr Manglani, we are concerned to see this and request you to confirm your PNR/ Seat Number via DM so we may have the same shared with our Concerned Team for further review and necessary action. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@NimishG38868584 Mr Gupta, as checked, refund is already processed and we request you to contact your concerned Travel Agency for refund in above-mentioned PNRs. Thanks. ~Navi
